thread.title: Gov. Bentley responds to threats on Jewish center: 'I will not tolerate targeted threats'
thread.title_full: Gov. Bentley responds to threats on Jewish center: 'I will not tolerate targeted threats'

author: Greg Garrison | ggarrison@al.com
title: Gov. Bentley responds to threats on Jewish center: 'I will not tolerate targeted threats'
text: Alabama Gov. Robert Bentley today issued a statement about the ongoing threats to Alabama's Jewish community and said he has authorized the use of state resources for investigation.
